column1: Applied Social Sciences: Globalisation and Crime MSc
column2: University of the Highlands and Islands
column5: Are you interested in exploring and understanding the world around you, particularly in relation to globalisation and crime, via the theory and application of the social sciences?The MSc Applied Social Sciences: Globalisation and Crime is a unique, multi-disciplinary programme that allows you to explore these critical issues using the disciplines of psychology, sociology, criminology, and politics, to gain in-depth understanding of these complex situations and employ your knowledge in the real world.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
